txt.en: 'You wish to complete Volume III, Book 7? By completing this quest, you will be bypassing the intro story to Rohan and the breaking of the Fellowship. Is this is what you want?\n\n'Speak to me again and I'll see to it that you have completed Volume III Book 7 of the Epic quest.'
'Are you prepared? You will now be granted completion of Volume III Book 7 of the Epic quest.'
Completion of this quest will flag your character has having completed all the quests in Book 7 of the Epic quest series of Volume III.
